CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 4, 1959, p. A3, reads: "Silver Spade - President R. T. McEnheimer uses a silver spade in ground-breaking ceremonies. Joining in historic event are, left to right: Dr. A. R. Taylor, Mr. McKee, Shedrick Fields, E. C. Alexander and Harris Lewis."
TitMainTitle: Loendi Club president R. T. McEnheimer holding shovel, and from left: Dr. A. R. Taylor, Mr. McKee, Shedrick Fields, E. C. Alexander, Harris Lewis standing in front of small pavilion with bunting, surrounded by small crowd including Reverend LeRoy Patrick wearing sunglasses and clerical collar, and William "Woogie" Harris on left, for groundbreaking ceremony of Loendi Club on Ledlie Street
